venue.address_1: Broadway, between Tremont St. and Norfolk St.
venue.name: Edward J. Sennott Park

item.description:
Pops on the Lawn

Sunday, June 27th 3:00 PM FREE

Sennott Park, Broadway at Norfolk St., Cambridge

Rain Location â€“ Area IV Youth Center, adjacent to park


The Little Girl and the Tree Branch by Harold Farberman with Brian Bell, WGBH Radio, Narrator


Superman Returns,Theme from E.T., 2001 Space Odyssey Theme, Star Trek, Star Wars, Wicked, Jupiter from The Planets

and, of course, Sousa marches

Bring Picnic Stuff, chairs, blankets, snacks to share... if it rains it's in a gymnasium nearby.
item.name: CSO Pops on the Lawn. Sennott Park Cambridge
